chat.askMeAnything: Ask me anything about your mental well-being and journal entries
chat.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete this conversation and all its messages. This action cannot be undone.
chat.createJournalEntries: Create journal entries to get personalized insights.

insights.noData: No data available for this timeframe

lifeAreas.title: Life Areas
lifeAreas.description: Important areas mentioned in your journal
lifeAreas.noData: No life areas found in this time period
lifeAreas.colorInfo: Color indicates sentiment: red (negative), yellow (neutral), green (positive)

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion
accountDeletion.subtitle: Request permanent deletion of your SOULo account

instructions.title: Account Deletion Instructions
instructions.description: Follow these steps to permanently delete your SOULo account:
instructions.step1: 1. Sign in to your SOULo account
instructions.alternative: Alternatively, you can contact us directly at support@soulo.online to request account deletion.

whatWillBeDeleted.title: What Will Be Deleted
whatWillBeDeleted.description: When you delete your account, the following data will be permanently removed:
whatWillBeDeleted.journalEntries: All journal entries, voice recordings, and transcriptions

processing.title: Processing Time
processing.description: Account deletion requests are processed within 30 days. During this period, your data remains accessible to allow for cancellation of the deletion request if needed.

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.description: If you have questions about account deletion or need assistance, please contact us:

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.subtitle: Learn about SOULo data deletion policies and procedures

dataTypes.title: Types of Data We Collect
dataTypes.description: SOULo collects and processes the following types of data:

analyticsData.title: Analytics Data
items: App usage statistics and session information

deletionProcess.title: Data Deletion Process
deletionProcess.description: When you request data deletion through SOULo:
deletionProcess.step1: 1. Submit deletion request through the app or via email
deletionProcess.step2: 2. We verify your identity and process the request
deletionProcess.step3: 3. All personal data is permanently deleted within 30 days
deletionProcess.step4: 4. You receive confirmation once deletion is complete

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: Some data may be retained for legal compliance:
retention.legal: Legal and regulatory requirements may require retention of certain records
retention.security: Security logs may be retained for fraud prevention and security purposes
retention.anonymized: Anonymized and aggregated data may be retained for research and analytics
retention.duration: Retained data is kept only as long as legally required

contact.title: Data Deletion Requests
contact.description: To request data deletion or exercise your data rights:
contact.subject: Subject: Data Deletion Request
contact.include: Please include your account email and specify which data you want deleted
contact.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days
